name: Hotties Up
description:
Hey beautiful, it's time to show off your styling talent!
If you love to dress up and get your flirt on—you'll love playing this brand-new game, Hotties Up! There’s tons of style themes and many chances for your character to get it on with their hot crush or just play it safe! Your choices will make or break your look, try it now!

GAME FEATURE
-Exquisite clothing!
-Step up your style!
-Dress up, glam up, and show them that you are a FASHIONISTA!
-Delicate and charming characters!
-Easy to play, difficult to master
-100+ levels!

Fabulous girls always figure out how to walk with style!
